subject: RE: [junit] Need Info
msgSnippet: Hi, List of Answers for a single question. 1. To reduce required time for debuging at the time of development. 2. Without automation we can not go for
messageBody:
Hi,

List of Answers for a single question.
1. To reduce required time for debuging at the time of development.
2. Without automation we can not go for extensive testing with probable
combination.
3. It helps to reduce the count of bugs in Balckbox testing.
4. Automation is the only proper way to do regression testing after bug
fixes or modifications.
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:

Please fill some more reasons in the blank.

Thanks,
Anil




-----Original Message-----
From: Mamata V Hegde [mailto:mamhegde@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 11, 2005 6:10 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Need Info


Hi All,
I have a question
Could any one please answer for this ??

Why Do we go For Automation during Unit Testing?

Thanks,
Mamata
